title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an overlapping wound in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a covered wound in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A vision that bandaging a wound in a dream indicates the dreamer’s health and safety, indicates abundant sustenance and abundant money, and indicates improved circumstances. If a person sees in a dream that he is bandaging his wounds, this indicates the cessation of problems and worries and the escalation of anxiety and sorrow. If the dreamer sees that he is healing the wounds of others, this means that he likes to provide help and assistance to others and indicates that the dreamer will join a job. Also, seeing the wound of others in a dream is one of the good visions that indicates good work and rising to a high position throughout life. Interpretation A dream about bandaging someone’s wound for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is bandaging her lover’s wounds, this indicates his close marriage to someone other than him. Also, seeing a bandaged wound in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the death of the problems, worries, and success she achieved in her life. Also, seeing a wound In an unmarried girl’s dream, it indicates her excellence in her studies and the good work she is doing. If an unmarried girl sees that someone is grooming her and he is unknown, this indicates that this person is deceiving her. Interpretation of seeing a wound bandage in a dream for a married womanIf she sees a married woman in her dream That she covers wounds, this indicates her intense love for her husband and shows the difficulties that she is going through. Likewise, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is taking care of the wound of a small child, this indicates her tenderness and kindness in her tenderness in reality, and God knows best. Likewise, if she sees her husband’s wound bleeding profusely And its color is black, this indicates the evil that haunts it and shows the envy and magic that fascinates it. Interpretation of seeing a wound bandaged in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is bandaging her wounds, this means that her date of birth will be determined and indicates that her birth will be easy. Also, if she sees in Her dream is that she was in an accident and then scratched in the dream, then this indicates the serious illness that she is suffering from and her danger. Interpretation of seeing a wound interfering in a man’s dream. If a man sees in his dream that he is covering the wound of his wife or one of his relatives, then this indicates the abundance of sustenance that he will obtain. Rather, if he sees If a man performs the duties of one of his relatives and scratches his hands, this indicates the friend’s betrayal and deception. Also, seeing someone sewing the wound of an unmarried person indicates the end of poverty and the payment of his debts to its owner. Interpretation of a dream about dressing another person’s wound: If a person sees in a dream an injured friend and treats her, this indicates His loyalty to his friend in times of distress, and God knows best. Also, seeing the wound on the owner’s head from a stranger indicates that he was actually injured, but it will be from his relative. And when a person sees a woman bleeding in a dream, this indicates some dangers that he will go through together for the rest of his life, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating bread: Seeing bread in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of eating bread in a dream by Ibn SirinEating bread in a dream for a single womanEating bread in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about eating bread for a girlInterpretation of bread in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream about eating bread for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about warm breadGiving bread in a dreamBaked bread indicates life and Islam, and it is the best type of bread, and it may indicate A loaf of bread is given to the nurturing mother with whom he reconciled religion. White bread indicates prosperity and livelihood, and pure bread indicates a beautiful white woman and pure living. And pure science, and every loaf shows a bundle of money. One hundred or ten, and so on, and bread indicates the departure of worries, and eating tortilla bread indicates the expansion of the diet, and a large loaf prolongs life, and following a broad diet. And whoever is a student of knowledge and sees in his dream that he is distributing bread to the weak and poor, he will acquire and take what knowledge he needs. If he is a preacher, these are his orders and advice. Prosperity prevails, which leads to infidelity, and whoever sees that he is baking bread, seeks permanent livelihood and benefit, and whoever bakes bread quickly gains state and money. Whoever takes a loaf in his dream will take a wife, and whoever sees many loaves and does not eat them, will meet his brothers, and show a clean and ripe loaf to the Sultan. The justice and impartiality of the Sultan, and for the sake of the maker is honesty in construction, and whoever sees bread in the dungeons in a dream, the price of bread will decrease. Interpretations of the evil of seeing bread in a dream: A loaf in a dream may indicate reproach, and whoever sees that bread was made above the clouds and above Roofs and above palms, bread will carry a high price, as will other goods and foods that will reach. The high cost of sugar or honey indicates high prices. And whoever saw a dead person took a loaf of bread and it fell into the fire, open or on the tar, and was idle - a lot of work stopped - Then he calls for heresy and rebellion to bring people down. It spoils, and warm bread indicates livelihood or hypocrisy, and whoever dreams that a loaf of bread is hanging on his forehead, this indicates poverty and want. Whoever eats bread in his sleep without eating it will get sick and die alone, and it is said that tortilla bread is short-lived and low in profit, and immature bread in a dream Indicates a high fever, and whoever has a loaf. . Of barley in a dream, he will live in an illusion of distress, and whoever sees a dry loaf his livelihood will become impoverished, and corn bread and chickpea bread also indicate high prices and his distress, and whoever is given a piece of bread and eats, the period has expired and his life is over, and if he takes a bite of bread then he is stingy. Elsewhere. ...The commentators said: Wheat flour is the property of a group and children, and its fermentation is the process of fermenting it for their relatives, and the dough is honorable money in trade, and a quick profit will be gained from it if it is fermented, and if it does not ferment, then it means corruption and hardship in money, and if it is sour, it leads to loss. And whoever sees that it ferments Barley flour is a man of faith who is influenced by the state, wealth, and victory over enemies. Bran: the difficulty of living and eating in poverty. Bread: an indication of knowledge and Islam because it is the pillar of religion, the foundation of the soul, and the life of the soul, and perhaps it

title: Interpretation of a dream about cocoa in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cocoa by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams: Cocoa in a dreamIt indicates hearing the happy news that God will receive in the near future. The dream of cocoa in a dream indicates excellence and success at work. The dream of cocoa indicates enjoyment, nourishment, and many goods that the dreamer acquires without fatigue and effort. Eating cocoa Biscuits in a dream mean comfort and a good life. Interpretation of seeing cocoa by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi confirmed Ibn Sirin’s opinion in interpreting the vision of cocoa, because it indicates nutrition without fatigue and good psychological comfort. The dream in which you see cocoa in a dream indicates the joy and pleasure that the dreamer will experience. If one sees In a dream, he gives cocoa to someone, this indicates the promotion he will receive at work and you will be in a prestigious position. Interpretation of a dream about cocoa for a single woman: Seeing black cocoa in a dream is evidence that his marriage is the same. To dream of drinking cocoa indicates weakness, relief from anxiety, and the removal of worries and problems. The sweet taste of cocoa indicates that an unmarried girl has a good, God-fearing husband inside her. A dream of cocoa for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself taking cocoa from someone, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If she sees herself taking cocoa from a dead person, this indicates Although he is moving to a new home. But if he sees that he is eating cocoa in large quantities, this indicates a lot of food and money that he will obtain. If a married woman sees someone stealing her cocoa, this indicates differences between her and her husband. A dream about seeing cocoa for a pregnant womanIf she sees A pregnant woman sees cocoa in white, it means that she will be blessed with a baby girl. If a pregnant woman sees a dead person distributing cocoa to people in a dream, this indicates the good news that she will hear after giving birth. Seeing cocoa in a man’s dreamSeeing cocoa in a man’s dream It indicates the happy life that he lives. It indicates Seeing an unknown person distributing cocoa in a dream indicates the money that the dreamer gets. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling with relatives for a single woman

preview.html: It is one of the interesting things that makes a person look at everything new, and seeing travel in a dream has many and varied interpretations, which we will present to him in various means of travel, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about traveling with relatives: Seeing yourself traveling with relatives expresses the bond that exists between the dreamer and his relatives. I would also like to see traveling with someone close to you. Expressing that there is a series of joint projects linking both the dreamer and this person. Something that requires their permanent joint presence. The vision of traveling to the country of India reflects the fulfillment of many hopes and aspirations. It is what a person desires to achieve and seeks. A lot for this matter. A woman who sees herself traveling to India is evidence of her ability to achieve what she wants. Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream Traveling in a dream is an expression of a person’s changing circumstances for the better. If this person is suffering from sadness, it is evidence of the approaching hour. Stagnation. Seeing travel in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a person who loves to travel and travel from one place to another. It may indicate that you are living in a state of psychological instability. A dream in which a person is seen traveling for the purpose of studying is an expression of the dreamer’s strong desire for knowledge. Another interpretation of a dream about traveling is the dreamer’s feeling of alienation. The vision of a trip also expresses to the dreamer that he wants to work to improve his financial situation. See also: Interpretation of seeing a trip in a dream in detail. Interpretation of dreams about traveling by plane. Whoever sees in his dream that he is traveling by plane. It is an expression of his superiority in many fields. Whether it is related to work or education. The vision of traveling by plane also expresses the viewer’s ability to achieve many financial benefits. And it will be very good in the coming period, and God knows best. There are other viewpoints that see air travel. A man’s expression of divorcing his wife and marrying another. Whoever saw He is traveling by plane and he is driving it. It is evidence that he has a strong ability to make his own decisions. Also, seeing him traveling by plane shows that he will be able to reach the highest houses. And so will his good reputation in the world. There are other interpretations that say that the interpretation of this vision is to obtain money. Considerable, as well as training certificates. In the event that you see yourself flying in one of the military aircraft. Evidence of closeness to the dreamer of the Almighty God. In the case of a dream about traveling by plane, the dreamer is afraid of flying. Evidence that his life is full of problems. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for a trip. Seeing preparations for travel in a dream represents Being exposed to a series of positive changes that will happen to the dream owner. If the single girl sees herself preparing for joy. It is evidence that she is going through a difficult time and is unable to make her decisions. Preparing to travel in a dream is an expression of the dream owner. He is preparing to enter into one of the new experiences to achieve His dreams. Interpretation of a dream about returning from a trip. The vision of returning from a trip indicates the presence of someone close to the dreamer. He will return soon from his travels, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream that he has returned from traveling again. Feels happy as an expression that he will be able to achieve everything he desires. As for the case...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the body for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the body for an unmarried woman. Skin problems that affect humans are among the most famous problems that many seek to solve in order to reduce their appearance and the side effects they cause of pigmentation and the appearance of unattractive pimples on the body for single and married women. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the bodyBody pimples In a dream, it is one of the most disturbing dreams for its owner, which actually affects his psychological and social state, and there are several indicators of this. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the body: If a man in a dream sees pimples on his body and they are large in size, this is a sign that the one who sees will get A lot of money if he engages in trade. Likewise, if the fortuneteller is an employee, then seeing pimples on his body indicates his promotion at work. But if the dreamer sees pimples on his leg, this indicates that the dreamer is energetic and active. Likewise, when the dreamer sees in a dream That there is only one grain on his body, this indicates the presence of a woman who controls his heart. His love for this woman makes him propose to her. But if the dreamer sees the presence of grains in his hand, this indicates a great provision from God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Qur’an in A dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing pimples on the face in a single woman’s dream. There are many dreams that people seek to have their own connotations, and pimples on the body or face are unpleasant things in real life. However, they are dreams that give good indicators, and here is seeing pimples on the face in a dream for a woman. Single woman: Seeing pimples in an unmarried girl’s dream means that there will be good news that she will be happy about. Also, for an unmarried woman to see in her dream with pimples and blisters, it means engagement soon after. On the other hand, when a girl sees pimples in her dream, And they are spread throughout her body, this indicates the presence of someone who loves her. Also, grains and spots in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate passion in general. As an unmarried woman, seeing grains in her dream indicates success in her studies and work as well. While spreading pills in a dream An unmarried woman on her body and neck indicates comfort and a stable life that the girl will enjoy. Also, seeing brown pimples is a sign that there are people in her life who are jealous of her. Also, seeing pimples on the face in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that there are mistakes in her life that need to be corrected. CorrectionAnd she thought about making decisions about her future life. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a bus or a bus in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about birth control pills in the body for a married womanInterpretations of dreams for married women differ from those for unmarried women, which also differ depending on their color. Interpretation of a dream about birth control pills in the body for a married woman If a married woman sees black seeds in a dream, this indicates kindness and nourishment in her life. Also, a married woman who sees black seeds in a dream indicates many profits that her husband will enjoy.

title: Interpretation of seeing a complaint in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing a complaint in a dream symbolizes asking someone for help and asking them for help to find comfort and happiness, and dreaming of complaining and crying almost indicates comfort and joy. He has authority and a high status, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a complaint in a dream: Seeing a complaint in a dream symbolizes asking for help to get rid of obstacles and obstacles. Whoever sees that he is complaining to someone in a dream, he is asking him for something that he lacks and needs, and the dream of filing a complaint indicates an attempt to collect rights and debts, and the complaint in the dream It is a sign of removing injustice from the dreamer and obtaining freedom. Complaining to God in sleep is a dream that promises comfort and an answer to prayers. Whoever sees that he is complaining to God and interrogating someone in a dream is trying to repel his complaint or harm. A written complaint in a dream is evidence of gaining rights through a lawsuit. A lawsuit or lawsuit, and whoever sees that he is writing a complaint in a dream is fleeing from enemies by deception, and the dream of filing a written complaint against someone indicates victory against him or against a conspiracy. Whoever sees someone complaining about him in a dream, he is demanding the restoration of the rights of others, and seeing someone complaining about you in a dream It means that this person is asking for help in his life. Seeing a complaint about someone cursing you in a dream indicates an attempt to get rid of the oppressor, and whoever sees himself complaining about someone who beat him in a dream will receive money and profits. Seeing a complaint about a dead person in a dream indicates unjust actions. Majidiya: Dreaming of a dead person complaining of pain indicates his need for charity and more begging, and whoever sees himself complaining about a dead person in a dream is asking the dead person’s family for an old debt. If you see a complaint of pain in a dream, this means that you are suffering from people’s words or you are insulting someone. Complaining about an illness in a dream is evidence of major problems between the fortuneteller and his wife. Interpretation of complaining and crying in a dream: A dream about complaining and crying indicates the nearness of relief after distress and an improvement in the situation. Whoever sees that he is complaining about someone and crying in his dream, expresses his suffering and pain to himself, and sees intense crying and complaining about someone. A person in a dream shows the great worries and sorrows that come from this person, and complaining and crying about parting with the person on his lip indicates his imminent journey or the approaching term of his term. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is complaining and crying about someone who hit him, then he is asking for a financial benefit and his dream is complaining and crying about Oppression shows frustration with the actions of others. Seeing complaining and pretending to cry in a dream indicates an attempt to achieve what you want in twisted ways. To see someone crying while complaining to you in a dream means that you have a high status and a word that is heard among people. And whoever sees someone complaining about him and crying in a dream is hearing words that do not He loves her. Complaining and crying about a misfortune in a dream is evidence of financial and social problems that the dreamer is trying to get rid of. Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a complaint of anxiety. Seeing a complaint of anxiety in a dream indicates the actions by which the dreamer washes away his sins, and his dream complaining of distress may indicate his great suffering. In love and adoration, according to Al-Nabulsi, and whoever sees that he is revealing his plight to someone in a dream, he will reveal his secrets
preview.text: Seeing a complaint in a dream symbolizes asking someone for help and asking them for help to find comfort and happiness, and dreaming of complaining and crying almost indicates comfort and joy. He has authority and a high status, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a complaint in a dream: Seeing a complaint in a dream symbolizes asking for help to get rid of obstacles and obstacles. Whoever sees that he is complaining to someone in a dream, he is asking him for something that he lacks and needs, and the dream of filing a complaint indicates an attempt to collect rights and debts, and the complaint in the dream It is a sign of removing injustice from the dreamer and obtaining freedom. Complaining to God in sleep is a dream that promises comfort and an answer to prayers. Whoever sees that he is complaining to God and interrogating someone in a dream is trying to repel his complaint or harm. A written complaint in a dream is evidence of gaining rights through a lawsuit. A lawsuit or lawsuit, and whoever sees that he is writing a complaint in a dream is fleeing from enemies by deception, and the dream of filing a written complaint against someone indicates victory against him or against a conspiracy. Whoever sees someone complaining about him in a dream, he is demanding the restoration of the rights of others, and seeing someone complaining about you in a dream It means that this person is asking for help in his life. Seeing a complaint about someone cursing you in a dream indicates an attempt to get rid of the oppressor, and whoever sees himself complaining about someone who beat him in a dream will receive money and profits. Seeing a complaint about a dead person in a dream indicates unjust actions. Majidiya: Dreaming of a dead person complaining of pain indicates his need for charity and more begging, and whoever sees himself complaining about a dead person in a dream is asking the dead person’s family for an old debt. If you see a complaint of pain in a dream, this means that you are suffering from people’s words or you are insulting someone. Complaining about an illness in a dream is evidence of major problems between the fortuneteller and his wife. preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about roasting chicks, via the website roy2a.com. Seeing a roasted chicken in a dream means prosperity, abundance of blessings, satisfying desires, and achieving the desired, raw chicken indicates problems, bad news, and widowhood, and providing interpretations of the great imams in interpreting visions and dreams in ancient and modern times. Follow us on the Vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream? According to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing a lot of chicken in a dream indicates achieving success, excellence, promotion at work, and high appreciation. Seeing roasted chicks indicates prosperity and prosperity and the death of poverty because it indicates a prestigious position. Seeing cooked chicken in a dream indicates abundance and prosperity. Seeing slaughtered chicken indicates hearing bad news and disasters. See also: Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing chicks roasting in a dream for a single woman: Seeing chicks roasting in a dream for a single woman announces her marriage to a rich man. Seeing a raw chicken in a dream for a girl indicates bad news and the breakup of an engagement or the end of a romantic relationship. If an unmarried girl is seen A married woman slaughtering a chicken indicates her marriage without the approval of her family. If a girl sees cooked chicken, it indicates the abundance of goodness and the satisfaction of her desire in life, and it also indicates a promotion or approaching her marriage. Seeing yourself eating chicken legs in a dream for a single woman indicates bad events that the girl is going through. See also: Interpretation of seeing chickens in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing roasting chicks in a dream for a married woman: Seeing in a dream roasting chicks for a married woman indicates the stability of her married life and the prosperity of life. If a married woman is seen slaughtering a chicken, it indicates the presence of another woman in her husband’s life. If the woman sees If a married woman sees a raw chicken, it indicates marital problems, quarrels, and bad news. If a married woman sees many chickens, it indicates an abundance of offspring and offspring. What is the interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing cooked chicken in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease and ease of childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees that she is cooking chicken, it indicates To the birth of a female child. If a pregnant woman sees a raw chicken, it indicates problems in pregnancy and childbirth. See also: Interpretation of seeing dead chicks in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing chicks roasted in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing eating chicken in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of her desires, prosperity and well-being in her life If a divorced woman sees that she is roasting a chicken, it indicates good news, her high status, and her acquisition of a prestigious status. If a divorced woman sees that she is cooking chicken, it indicates comfort after fatigue, happiness, and stability in her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about cooked chicken and rice: Seeing cooked chicken with rice in a dream indicates the luxury of life. And the rise in the material. Dreaming of grilled chicken, it indicates a lot of money and a lot of sustenance. Seeing eating chicken breasts indicates a promotion or a distinguished job. See also: Interpretation of seeing a chicken being cleaned in a dream. Interpretation of cooking chicken in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a chicken being cooked, it indicates hearing good news. And

title: I dreamed that I was walking with a dead man

preview.html: I dreamed that I was walking with a dead person in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing dead people in a dream is one of the visions that is often repeated in many scenes, and the interpretation varies from one vision to another. We present to you: I dreamed that I was walking with a dead man. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was walking with a dead man in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of walking with the dead in a dream, and it indicates The dreamer is free of all the troubles and crises he was going through in the previous period, and God knows best. Seeing a dream that you are walking with the dead also indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, sustenance, and money, and God knows best. See another interpretation: I dreamed that they gave me money. I dreamed that I was walking With a dead man in a dream about a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman walking with the dead in a dream indicates that the coming period of her life will be full of goodness, happiness, and promises, and God knows best. Walking with the dead at night in one sleep indicates the many obstacles that she will face in her academic and professional life, and God knows best. See. Another interpretation: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving incense to the living. I dreamed that I was walking with a dead man in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman walking violently with the dead in a dream indicates the end of the disputes between her and her husband, and she will live a happy and stable married life, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a dead person He walks beside her at night in a dream, and this indicates many crises and problems between her and her husband at this time, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was walking with a dead woman in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman walking with the dead in a dream indicates that many promising things will happen in her life and that she You feel happy and joyful, and God knows best. Walking with the dead during the night in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she faced some difficulties during the birth process, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a dead cow in a dream. I dreamed that I was walking with a dead man in a dream about a man. Seeing a man walking with the dead In a dream, this indicates his inability to achieve his goals despite his efforts to do so, and God knows best. Walking with the dead at night in a man’s dream indicates the loss of a lot of money and his great financial distress in the coming period, and God knows best. Walking with the dead in a man’s dream also indicates that he has committed many sins. And he turned away from his Lord, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was walking along a familiar dead road. Seeing the dream that you are walking with the dead on a familiar road indicates good and abundant sustenance for the beholder, and God knows best. Walking with the dead on a road known as a dream may indicate that the dreamer will face many obstacles in His life, but he will be able to overcome it. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a crutch in a dream. Seeing yourself walking with the dead on a crutch in a dream. Seeing yourself walking with the dead on a crutch in a dream indicates that the dead man was a righteous man, and did good in his life, and God knows best. We are pleased that We see reception

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about joy without music

preview.html: Dream of joy without music. Many girls dream of wearing a wedding dress and marrying the man they have always dreamed of living a happy and stable life, and later giving birth to good offspring and creating a cohesive family, and therefore this desire may still be present in your dream as well, but when you see the same person bringing the joy of one of your relatives, But without music or any aspect of the celebration, this may mean that you are facing some problems or going through financial or health crises during this time, so follow us on the following lines to learn more interpretations about seeing joy without music. Interpretation of a dream about joy without music. Many interpretation scholars differed. In seeing joy in a dream, but without the appearance of musical instruments, as some have stated that this is a bad omen for the dreamer, indicating the emergence of some problems or going through some crises in the current period in which they are experiencing. He feels upset, sad, and unable to live life normally. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type an Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream of joy without hymns. If one sees that his wedding is without music, this means that he is suffering from an illness or facing an illness for some time But he quickly overcomes it, and if he works in a job and sees this, this indicates that he will be fired from it or terminate his contract and look for another job. However, some other opinions have indicated that this dream may be a sign of problems that the person may face when he makes some fateful decisions in the period Current, thus this dream appears. To keep him from falling into it, it may indicate that he stays away from suspicious places and does not hold weddings with dancing and musical instruments. A dream of joy for a single and married person without music, and if the unmarried person is the one who sees this dream, this may indicate that he is facing some financial crises that prevent him from completing his marriage. Right now, if those attending this wedding are wearing dark clothes and are darkened by their grief. This indicates that the marriage is incomplete and his feeling of sadness and sorrow for it, which reflects his psychological state and makes him see it in a dream, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Sources:- 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams , Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a living person inviting the dead for food

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a living person inviting the dead to eat for unmarried people. There are many clues and meanings to interpret the dream of the living inviting the dead to eat for the virgin girl, and the most important of these clues are the following: If the virgin girl sees herself offering food to a deceased person in a dream and feels happy at that time, this indicates It indicates that she will be blessed with abundance in the near future. But if the virgin sees that she is sitting and eating with a dead person, this indicates that she will spend days without problems and difficulties. It also indicates that she will be blessed with abundant goodness in the near future, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a living person who invited the dead for food for the eldest girl. By refusing to eat the food, just as the dreamer did not eat. This is evidence of the loss of money for the girl, and this vision is not good, and God knows best. But if a virgin sees in a dream that a dead man is asking for a lot of food. This is evidence of the visionary getting rid of the problems she suffered from and which caused She has her worries and sorrows, and God knows best. If an older girl sees that she is feeding her dead brother in a dream, this indicates the end of the worries, problems, and crises that happened to her in reality. For an unmarried girl to dream of feeding a dead person is evidence of her success in her or her work, and it may The dream also indicates her emotional success. Some dream interpreters say that seeing a girl in her dream offering food to a dead person is evidence that the dreamer will succeed in her life and studies, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. An unmarried girl offering food to a deceased person may indicate her relationship as soon as possible. Even if She was engaged, so this dream is evidence of the approaching date of her wedding, and God knows best. In general, the interpretation of dreams about the living person calling the dead to her virgin daughter promises that good things will happen that will change the life she is living for the better, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead Interpretation of a dream about the living person calling the dead To eat food for a married woman: There are many interpretations and meanings of a dream about offering food to a deceased person in a dream for a married woman, and among the most important of these interpretations are the following: A wife’s dream that she is preparing lunch for a dead person is evidence that the dreamer is compromising a lot to make her family happy and always fulfill their desires, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about the person The living person who invites the deceased to eat food for his wife and actually feeds him. It is evidence of the great efforts that the dreamer is making in order to bear the responsibilities of her family. This dream may indicate the relief that the dreamer will feel after a long struggle in the life that she is living. He will be blessed with abundant goodness as soon as possible. And God knows best. If the wife sees herself serving food to her deceased mother and eating with her in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer imitates her mother in everything she did while she was alive, and God knows best. But if the wife sees herself serving food to her deceased grandmother and eating her food with her in the dream, This indicates that she follows the same path as her grandmother, and thus her life is characterized by traditions and lags behind those around her. Follow the interpretation of the dream of the living inviting the dead to eat. Many dream interpreters agree
